edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.plaintext

Interface Plaintext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigIntegerPlainText, ByteArrayPlaintext, GroupElementPlaintext

    public interface Plaintext
    This is a marker interface for all plain-texts.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlaintextSendableData generateSendableData()
      This function is used when a Plaintex needs to be sent via a Channel or any other means of sending data (including serialization).

    • Method Detail

      • generateSendableData

        PlaintextSendableData generateSendableData()
        This function is used when a Plaintex needs to be sent via a Channel or any other means of sending data (including serialization). It retrieves all the data needed to reconstruct this Plaintext at a later time and/or in a different VM. It puts all the data in an instance of the relevant class that implements the PlaintextSendableData interface.
        Returns:
        the PlaintextSendableData object
